source: • Par tge va'gl agl tieus cudesch? Resumescha an tres construcziùns quegl ca tei âs ligieu.
target: • Per tge vogl aint igl ties codesch? Resumescha chegl tgi te ast gio ligia cun treis construcziuns.

source: 4. Jou ve tschentg sutbieadis ca statan agl Grischùn.
target: 4. Ia va tschintg sotbeadis tgi stattan aint igl Grischun.

source: p.ex. a la staziùn, a la plaza aviatica, contact cun passaschiers easters
target: p.ex. alla staziun, agl eroport, contact cun passagiers esters
